methods.getKeyFor:
Return the performance key for the provided table.

:param table: (io.deephaven.engine.table.Table) - the table that will be logged
:return: (java.lang.String) the table key or null if no entry should not be logged

text:
Enable barrage performance metrics by setting the BarragePerformanceLog.enableAll configuration property, or
 by adding the table key as an
 attribute to the table.
